sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

scanner_model.Description: scanner model in which data was acquired (i.e. the scanner was upgraded during the study)

L1_ses-01.Description: Peformance on adapted Boston Naming Test in subject's native language (Spanish) in the first session

L1_ses-02.Description: Peformance on adapted Boston Naming Test in subject's native language (Spanish) in the second session

Ln_ses-01.Description: Peformance on adapted Boston Naming Test in subject's new language (English) in the first session

Ln_ses-02.Description: Peformance on adapted Boston Naming Test in subject's new language (English) in the second session
